name.en: Register of Associations - Ministry of Social Development, Jordan

description.en:
"The register of associations was established in the Ministry of Social Development in the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan by virtue of the Associations Law No. (51) of 2008 and its amendments which abolished the Law of Associations and Voluntary Organizations No. 33 of 1966 and its amendments. The register of associations is the regulator of the associations sector in the Kingdom and in line with the legislation in force."[1]

"The Ministry / Directorate of the Register of Associations has issued the approval of the Council of Ministers at the meeting held on 18/10/2015 to adopt a mechanism (unified) for approval of foreign funding provided to each of the associations, civil society organizations and non-profit companies operating in the Kingdom to unify its authority and organization The process of submitting applications and determining the official bodies concerned to receive requests for funding according to the specialization and as described below and to identify the tasks and procedures to be followed and to submit the application to the head of the ministry to facilitate the process of obtaining the necessary approvals:
1. 	Ministry of Social Development / Directorate of the Register of Associations, Associations registered under the Law of Associations in force and projects and programs that serve the Jordanian community.
2. 	Ministry of Industry and Trade / Companies Control Department, for non-profit companies registered under the Non-Profit Companies Law.
3. 	Ministry of Planning and International Cooperation / Coordinating Committee, for foreign funding received by associations and non-profit companies and civil society institutions and projects, programs and activities aimed at supporting the government's efforts to bear the burden of hosting refugees."[2]

[1]: http://www.societies.gov.jo/SitePage.aspx?PageId=107 (translated from Arabic)
[2]: http://www.societies.gov.jo/SitePage.aspx?PageId=124 (translated from Arabic)

access.onlineAccessDetails: The front page of http://www.societies.gov.jo has a search box where NGOs can be searched by name. The interface is available in Arabic only.
access.guidanceOnLocatingIds:
Use the "national number of association" (الرقم الوطني للجمعية in original Arabic) as found on the search results page. 

These are typically 13-digit numbers.

meta.source: Desk research Open Data Services (request from IATI publisher)
